Html:
I would like to generate chart graphs with a preset like this is possible in Excel itsself.
In the german version of Excel this is called "Layout #5":
all Values of the Chart are displayed in a table below (but inside the graph).

Is it possible with PHPExcel to manage the graphs to be displayed like in the mentioned "Layout #5"?


My PHP Version 5.6.0
PHPExcel version: 1.8.0, 2014-03-02
My System: Windows 7
